fulltext:
Luat Vu Dinh 
Nam Tu Liem, Hanoi, Vietnam, 100000 
84984-254-592 | luatvudinh@icloud.com 
PROFILE 
•I have been working as a full-stack iOS app developer in BM R&D since Feb 2017.
I used to work as a windows desktop app developer in BM R&D from Jun 2015 to Feb 2017. 
•I graduated from Vietnam National University, Hanoi in early 2017 and I was second in the class 
with GPA is 3.58. 
EDUCATION 
•The degree of engineering mechanics from Vietnam National University, Hanoi. 
•Android programming thematic from VTC Academy in 2013. 
EXPERIENCES 
Self-working 
•Mobile app developer
Language/Framework: Swift, Flutter, nodejs, mongodb. 
May 2019 - Present 
BM Research and Development 
Hanoi, Vietnam 
•Backend engineer
Language/Framework: Python, mySQL. 
•Fullstack iOS app developer 
Feb 2017 - Apr 2019
Language/Framework: Swift, Python, mySQL, AWS. 
•Windows desktop app developer 
Jun 2015 - Feb 2017
Language/Framework: C++, Python, Matlab. 
SKILLS 
•XCode, Visual Studio Code. 
•Upload app to Apple Store (internal testing). 
•Trello, JIRA. 
•Git, Gitlab, SVN. 
RESEARCH EXPERIENCE 
•Named in a paper on the scientific journal: Nguyen Dinh Duc, Tran Quoc Quan, Vu Dinh Luat 
(2015). Nonlinear dynamic analysis and vibration of shear deformable piezoelectric FGM double 
curved shallow shells under damping-thermo-electro-mechanical loads. Composite Structures, 
Vol 125, pp 29-40 (2015). 
SCHOLARSHIP AND HONORS 
Scholarships 
•Learning encouragement scholarship, during semesters 4, 5, 6, 7 & 8, granted by the 
Vietnam National University, Hanoi.  
•The Thakral - In Sewa scholarship for the academic year 2014-2015. 
•The Vallet scholarship in 2015. 
•The Mitsubishi scholarship for the academic year 2015-2016. 
Honors 
•The first prize of scientific research prize for undergraduate student in 2014-2015. 
•Certificate of representative young face in the academic year 2014-2015 & 2015-2016. 
•Certificate of 5-good-point student in academic year 2014-2015. 
•Certificate of outstanding student of course 2012-2017. 
EXTRA-CURRICULUM ACTIVITIES 
•Participated in two “Sáng Tạo Việt” (Vietnam Creation) on the VTC3 television channel: 
First prize for "Caterpillars catching solutions" in 2013, and second prize for "Reading 
number on electricity meters" in 2014. 
•Certificate of effective contributing for the summer campaign of voluntary youth in 
2013.
